channel.title: Need a anti mass! nothing helps! :'(

item.title: Need a anti mass! nothing helps! :'(
item.dc:creator: @junkyNL junkyNL
item.description:
@junkyNL wrote:

this is what ive done, but it aint helping :S

how do i make it so you can’t mass anymore, i need like a code so you only click once in the 1/2/3 seconds… but this code aint working, and it should :eek:

private long lastClick;
case 2485: if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastClick < 2000) { } if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You Smashed The Altar So Fcking Hard, That It Gives Runes!"); addItem(554,1); addItem(555,1); addItem(556,1); addItem(557,1); addItem(558,1); addItem(559,1); addItem(560,1); addItem(561,1); addItem(562,1); addItem(563,1); addItem(564,1); addItem(565,1); addItem(566,1); addItem(995, 2000); actionTimer = 5; setAnimation(2068); addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[20]), 20); lastClick = System.currentTimeMillis(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

also i can mass every monster… my project is almost done!!! like for 90% only need the anti mass and im done!

please help me out, moparscape is a great community btw much better than rune-server

projectHeavenX Coming! Learned alot the last years, and i made the whole server from a scratch, will be wonderfull… get ready to meet the new Pk Heaven ![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 25, 2008, 08:37:49 am[/size][hr]only need a anti masser now!

base used: project evolved 7.0!
